type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Advisor
rules_text:
Flying, trample
[i]Spear of Assal[/i] – Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter tapped.
[i]Hammer of Judgment[/i] – Whenever one or more Knights you control deal combat damage to a player, detain target nonland permanent that player controls.
[i]Crest of Cichol[/i] – Only one creature can attack you each combat.
